channel.title: JDK Wont Show
channel.description:
Alright I Download JDK , But it Wont Show In The Java Folder In Program Files On C:\ .. Anyways ive Tried EVERYTHING , And it wont work so , if u guys can help me out , thanks
plus, its on my friends old comp .
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ONE MOR THING , When You Click Run On A Server And It Pops Up Fast Then Dissapears Is That A JDK Problem Or What , ? And How dO I Fix Theese .
IF U ANSWER I WILL GREATLY APPREICATE !!
THANKSSSSSSSSSSS

item.title: JDK Wont Show
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Use this as your compiler code and post the error you receive:

@echo off
javac ./*.java
pause

The “pause” command will keep the command window open untill you close it. Gives you more then enough time to read what it prints. Without it, the shell will close immediatly after the command has been executed.

Read full topic

item.title: JDK Wont Show
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Yes that’s a batch error, so something is not letting it run so it closes. In this case it’s the java. To see how you can fix this error edit your batch file and change the ‘exit’ to ‘pause’ it will pause on the batch file you are trying to run, so you can find the error easier. If you don’t have any text with ‘exit’ just add ‘pause’ to teh bottom of the batch file.

Read full topic
